Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Worker
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
The worker is the the mean through which a player can perform changes on the model. It contains a reference to its owner and the tile it's occupying.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Worker()
    Constructor to initialize a worker, mainly used in tests
    Worker​(Player player)  
    Worker​(Tile initialPosition, Player player)
    Constructor to initially place a worker on a given Tile.

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker()
      Constructor to initialize a worker, mainly used in tests

    • Worker

      public Worker​(Player player)

    • Worker

      public Worker​(Tile initialPosition, Player player)
      Constructor to initially place a worker on a given Tile.

      The constructor should be called at the start of a game when the Player calls Player.addWorker(Tile) to place his workers

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move​(Tile t)
      Moves the worker on a different Tile if possible. If the worker performs a winning movement, his owner is set winner.
      Parameters:
      t - Tile to move the worker onto
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - Thrown if the selection is not valid

    • legalMove

      public boolean legalMove​(Tile t)
      Parameters:
      t - Tile to check the possible move
      Returns:
      Returns true if the move is possible: the tile must be free, not with a dome, not with a level difference of +2, adjacent and different from the one the worker is occupying

    • build

      public void build​(Tile t)
      Builds with the worker on a Tile. If it reaches level 3, it builds a dome.
      Parameters:
      t - Tile to build on

    • legalBuild

      public boolean legalBuild​(Tile t)
      Parameters:
      t - Tile to check the possible build
      Returns:
      Returns true if the build is possible: the tile must be unoccupied, without a dome and adjacent

    • getPositionOnBoard

      public Tile getPositionOnBoard()
      Returns:
      Returns the Tile the worker is occupying

    • setPositionOnBoard

      public void setPositionOnBoard​(Tile t)
      Places the worker on the selected tile

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns:
      Returns the worker's owner

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner​(Tile t)
      Checks if the movement on the selected tile is a winning condition
      Parameters:
      t - Tile the worker is going to move onto
      Returns:
      true if the basic winning condition is verified: the player must move up from level 2 to level 3
